page.title: 07WOLVERLEY YOUTH GROUPS
page.content: {Wolverley Playschool }opened in 1964. It takes children aged 3 to 5 years. There are 24 boys and 16 girls in the playschool.There are 6 helpers.Mrs.Small is the leader.The children come from the Wolverley area,Kidderminster and Bewdley. { Wolverley Cub Scouts}meet each Thursday in the village Scout Hut. There is also a {Brownie Guide pack which meets on the same evening. For older girls there is a {Girl {Guide }group. The children in the village also attend a {Sunday School }which meets in the Church.
